name: subgraph-protocol-v2
description: This package contains subgraph of the protocol v2

scripts.update-abi-addresses: npm run update-address && npm run prepare:abi
scripts.prepare:all: npm run prepare:contracts && npm run prepare:subgraph
scripts.prepare:contracts: rm -rf externals && npm run submodule:get && npm run submodule:compile-contracts
scripts.prepare:contracts:local: npm run submodule:get && npm run deploy-contracts && npm run update-address
scripts.submodule:get: git submodule add -f https://github.com/aave/protocol-v2.git externals/protocol-v2 && npm run submodule:install
scripts.submodule:compile-contracts: git submodule foreach npm run compile
scripts.submodule:deploy-contracts: git submodule foreach npm run aave:docker:dev:migration
scripts.submodule:deploy:scenario: git submodule foreach npm run test-subgraph:scenarios
scripts.deploy-contracts: npm run submodule:compile-contracts && npm run submodule:deploy-contracts
scripts.deploy-stack:local: npm run prepare:all && npm run subgraph:local
scripts.deploy-stack:local:scenario: npm run submodule:deploy:scenario && npm run update-abi-addresses && npm run prepare:subgraph && npm run subgraph:local
scripts.deploy-stack:local:post-scenario: npm run update-abi-addresses && npm run prepare:subgraph && npm run subgraph:deploy:local
scripts.deploy:hosted:kovan: BLOCKCHAIN=ethereum NETWORK=kovan env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=aave/protocol-v2-kovan env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:hosted
scripts.deploy:hosted:mainnet: BLOCKCHAIN=ethereum NETWORK=mainnet env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=aave/protocol-v2 env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:hosted
scripts.deploy:hosted:matic: BLOCKCHAIN=matic NETWORK=matic env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=aave/aave-v2-matic env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:hosted
scripts.deploy:self-hosted:kovan: BLOCKCHAIN=ethereum NETWORK=kovan npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=aave/protocol-v2-kovan npm run subgraph:deploy:self-hosted
scripts.deploy:self-hosted:mainnet: BLOCKCHAIN=ethereum NETWORK=mainnet npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=aave/protocol-v2 npm run subgraph:deploy:self-hosted
scripts.deploy:self-hosted:matic: BLOCKCHAIN=matic NETWORK=matic env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=aave/aave-v2-matic env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:local

author: AAVE <tech@aave.com>
